mapper.sql: userid, name, gender, username, permission, password, age, idnumber, identity, mobilenumber, area, school, classname, verifyquestion, verifyanswer, create_time, update_time,grade,major,wx_Openid
mapper.select:
select
from user
order by ${sortField} ${sortOrder}
order by update_time desc

update user
